thread.title: Louise
thread.title_full: Optical Express | Laser Eye Surgery reviewed by Louise

author: Louise
title: Louise
text:
Everyone was friendly, well informed and honest; from the initial consultation, to meeting the consultant & having the surgery as well as the follow up visits, I felt supported and cared for.
My corrected vision is excellent - I keep forgetting that I don't need to take my contact lenses out at bedtime !!
